name: Davyria: Heroes of Eternity
description: Davyria is an action role-playing game with a well-designed and challenging combat system. You play an Eternal Warrior wandering the barren island of Davyria.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 6 GB available space
